articles.title: Mass shooting at South African hostel bar leaves 11 dead, including 3 children - PBS
articles.description: A mass shooting carried out Saturday by multiple suspects in an unlicensed bar near the South African capital left at least 11 people dead, police said. The victims included three children aged 3, 12 and 16.
